title: Emerald Peacock Chandbali Earrings - Elegant Jhumkas for the Modern Bride
materials: Cultured Pearls. Features a durable Hyderabadi Polish for long-lasting shine.
features: Intricate peacock motif Chandbali design, showcasing traditional South Indian artistry. Features a central Emerald green stone surrounded by dazzling CZ diamonds. Delicate pearl drops enhance the elegance. Design inspired by classic temple jewelry with a modern twist.
colors: Cream (Pearls). The classic South Indian color combination exudes sophistication.
occasions: and festive occasions like Diwali or Sankranthi. Also suitable for elegant evening events and special gatherings.
description: A stunning fusion of traditional South Indian design and contemporary style. The vibrant emerald and dazzling CZ diamonds create a captivating sparkle. The peacock motif represents beauty and grace, adding a touch of symbolism. Handcrafted with meticulous attention to detail, ensuring lasting quality and brilliance. A statement piece that will elevate any outfit.
